channel.title: Hybrid pvp help
channel.description:
Hey everyone im trying to get some teleports to work and i need help with the message that pops up when u log in and it says welcome to hybrid pvp register in the forums by doing ::register, donate to keep the server going 24/7...
if you know how to do this please leave a comment...
If you have teamviewer then we can teamview and you can show me.
Thanks Saw4

item.title: Hybrid pvp help
item.dc:creator: @TheCyberMan TheCyberMan
item.description:
@TheCyberMan wrote:

[quote=“saw4, post:3, topic:415884”]where is the messagetimer.java[/quote]It’s a Delta thing I guess Download a few Deltas to see if they have it. You can observe the code and implement something similar to your game. Personally, I find the constant reminders annoying, though.

Read full topic

item.title: Hybrid pvp help
item.dc:creator: @saw4 saw4
item.description:
@saw4 wrote:

where is the messagetimer.java

Read full topic

item.title: Hybrid pvp help
item.dc:creator: @TheCyberMan TheCyberMan
item.description:
@TheCyberMan wrote:

We need to know the action ID of the teleports. “MessageTimer.java” has the constant messages while playing the game. If you just want to have the message upon log in, search in client.java (ctrl f your current message when you log on).

Note: I do not use Hybrid PvP, so I cannot help you fully.

Read full topic
